markdownRemark.excerpt: Safari does not support transparent in gradients. We need to use a fully transparent color instead with opacity 0. See https://codepen.io/pik_at/pen/dYWLrR
markdownRemark.html: 1. Safari does not support transparent in gradients. We need to use a fully transparent color instead with opacity 0. See https://codepen.io/pik_at/pen/dYWLrR

frontmatter.title: The Joy of Doing Things without the Need for Justification
